# Makisala

> Bespoke African safari experiences across East Africa — handcrafted by experts, designed for every type of traveller. From romantic escapes to family-friendly adventures, Makisala makes your dream safari simple to plan and unforgettable to experience.

Key terms: Serengeti, Gorilla Trekking, Safari Itinerary, Luxury Lodges, Tailor-made Travel, Maasai Mara, Sustainable Safaris.

## Safari Types
- [Family Safari](https://makisala.com/who-is-travelling/family-safari): Kid-friendly safaris, multi-generational travel, malaria-free destinations.
- [Couples & Honeymooners](https://makisala.com/who-is-travelling/couples-and-honemooners): Romantic lodges, private game drives, island escapes.
- [Group of Friends Safari](https://makisala.com/who-is-travelling/group-of-friends): Shared adventure planning, group deals, flexible itineraries.

## Locations
- [Tanzania](https://makisala.com/location/tanzania.md): Serengeti, Ngorongoro, Zanzibar — wildlife, beaches, culture.
- [Rwanda](https://makisala.com/location/rwanda.md): Gorilla trekking, volcano hikes, Kigali city stays.
- [Kenya](https://makisala.com/location/kenya.md): Big Five safaris, Maasai Mara, Great Migration.

## Booking & Planning
- [How It Works](https://makisala.com/about): 5-step safari journey from dream to experience.
- [Contact](https://makisala.com/contact): Speak with a safari specialist, online enquiry form.
- [To Book](https://makisala.com/to_book): Custom safari builder and enquiry details.

## Blog
- [Travel Stories](https://makisala.com/blog): Safari tips, destination highlights, packing guides.
- [Trip Planning Advice](https://makisala.com/blog/planning.md): Best times to visit, what to expect on safari.

## Customer Support
- [Contact](https://makisala.com/contact): Get in touch directly with the Makisala team.
- [FAQs](https://makisala.com/about#faq): Common questions about booking, safety, and travel.

## Optional
- [Sustainability at Makisala](https://makisala.com/about#sustainability): Our responsible tourism practices and local partnerships.
